New Records: Cade Cunningham recorded his first triple-double of the regular season with 17 points, 11 rebounds, and 11 assists
Key Match Events: The Pistons had a balanced offensive attack with Jaden Ivey scoring 26 points and six players finishing in double figures; the Lakers' bench scored 10 points while the Pistons' bench contributed 27 points
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pistons secured their first winning streak of the season; the Lakers struggled on the road; social media reactions from fans celebrated the Pistons' victory
